txt.en:
'You have done a great deal for us here in Galtrev, [placeholder]. I am sure you will be back, for our city is great. Yet if you wish to continue your travels through Dunland, you should head south to the Starkmoor.

'I am sure there are folk in need of aid there, as well. Perhaps they too feel the oppression of Isengard. Saruman has stretched his White Hand perilously far into our lands.

'A fellow named Andras just led his caravan in that direction...perhaps you can overtake him on the road, and he can show you around.'
'A thief on the road! Help! Help! Oh, why will no one help me?\n\n'You...you are not here to steal my wares? Ah! Perhaps you can help me, then. As you see, I am in a bit of trouble.'
The Starkmoor is a land to the south of Pren Gwydh.
The Starkmoor is to the south-west of Pren Gwydh.\n\nYou should search for Andras, the leader of a caravan, on the road from Pren Gwydh to the Starkmoor.
